main event: A civilian in Hollywood, California reported seeing one object, the size of a dime, with a blue-white color, disappearing into the hills.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on May 6, 1956, during darkness at 2222 PDT.
The observer reported the object at an altitude of eight to ten thousand feet, traveling towards the north before disappearing.
The witness was a scriptwriter for movies, adding credibility to the report.
The conclusion of the report suggested that the object was probably an aircraft due to limited data.
The report noted that the 'size of dime' description was considered impossible to translate into useful data.
sighted object: one object, size of a dime, blue-white in color
